ordinaryTruck

Class OrdinaryTruck

  • java.lang.Object
    • truck.Truck
      • ordinaryTruck.OrdinaryTruck

  • public class OrdinaryTruck
extends Truck
    Ordinary Truck. A truck, possessing the following properties: – Cost in dollars equal to 750 + 0.25q where q is the total quantity of items in the cargo. – Cargo capacity of 1000 items. – Cargo. Temperature controlled items cannot be stored in an ordinary truck’s cargo, only dry goods.
    Author:
    Mitchell Willemse (n9470620).
